_header: Saint Stephen his passion has published
_description: ‘De sancto stephano prothomartire’ (version in short lines)

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saynt steuyn his passion has puplistNext folowand efter þe birth of crist…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …vnto þat life þat lastes ayþat sufferd ded for oure misdede
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 28-34.
